title: A Detective's 'Walk Among The Tombstones' Is Gripping But Unsatisfying
teaser: In the '70s, novelist Lawrence Block created New York private investigator Matthew Scudder who chases extreme bad guys. Liam Neeson now plays the character the new grisly film directed by Scott Frank.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
